title: Listener Telemetry Document
description: Stores information about a listener's position.

type.title: Document Type
type.description: Indicates that this is a listener_telemetry document. Should be 'listener_telemetry'.

time_created.title: Time Created
time_created.description: An RFC3339 string containing the time this document was created.

time_uploaded.title: Time Uploaded
time_uploaded.description: An RFC3339 string containing the time this document was uploaded to the database.

data.title: Listener Position Data
data.description: Information on the listener's position, including latitude, longitude and altitude.

callsign.title: Listener Callsign
callsign.description: A callsign for this listener. Does not hae to be an official amateur radio callsign.

latitude.title: Listener Latitude
latitude.description: The listener's current latitude, in decimal degrees.

longitude.title: Listener Longitude
longitude.description: The listener's current longitude, in decimal degrees.

altitude.title: Listener Altitude
altitude.description: The listener's current altitude, in metres above sea level.
